body_html:
Definitely not. In my case, I had to make a for loop to iterate over my boxes to do the same thing as you did. Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
…
________________________________ From: Lzane 李澤帆 <notifications@github.com> Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2018 12:07:51 AM To: tensorflow/tensorflow Cc: Axel-Christian Gueï; Mention Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] tf.image_crop_and_resize return 0 values when using GPU on Jetson TX2 (#13889) @0fficer1<https://github.com/0fficer1> Yes When I run tf.image_crop_and_resize on TX2, it return 0 or something wired like 3.9e-4. I have tried version 1.3, 1.4, 1.6 on my TX2 and all failed. I finally use tf.image.crop_to_bounding_box and tf.image.resize_images as an alternative. But now I have to handle the padding by my self. Do you have better solutions? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body_text:
Definitely not. In my case, I had to make a for loop to iterate over my boxes to do the same thing as you did.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
…
________________________________
From: Lzane 李澤帆 <notifications@github.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2018 12:07:51 AM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow
Cc: Axel-Christian Gueï; Mention
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] tf.image_crop_and_resize return 0 values when using GPU on Jetson TX2 (#13889)


@0fficer1<https://github.com/0fficer1> Yes
When I run tf.image_crop_and_resize on TX2, it return 0 or something wired like 3.9e-4.
I have tried version 1.3, 1.4, 1.6 on my TX2 and all failed.

I finally use tf.image.crop_to_bounding_box and tf.image.resize_images as an alternative. But now I have to handle the padding by my self.

Do you have better solutions?

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

body:
Definitely not. In my case, I had to make a for loop to iterate over my boxes to do the same thing as you did.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
From: Lzane 李澤帆 <notifications@github.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2018 12:07:51 AM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow
Cc: Axel-Christian Gueï; Mention
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] tf.image_crop_and_resize return 0 values when using GPU on Jetson TX2 (#13889)


@0fficer1<https://github.com/0fficer1> Yes
When I run tf.image_crop_and_resize on TX2, it return 0 or something wired like 3.9e-4.
I have tried version 1.3, 1.4, 1.6 on my TX2 and all failed.

I finally use tf.image.crop_to_bounding_box and tf.image.resize_images as an alternative. But now I have to handle the padding by my self.

Do you have better solutions?

—
